bill.title: Property Insurance Clarity Act; create.
bill.description: An Act To Create The Property Insurance Clarity Act; To Require Insurance Companies Authorized To Transact Homeowners Insurance Business In The State To Provide Policy And Premium Information To The Insurance Department; To Require The Department To Provide On The Department Website Aggregate Information For Homeowners Insurance Policies, Pertaining To The Number Of Policies In Force And The Direct Incurred Losses Representing The Total Of Every Insurance Company Doing Business In The State; To Require The Department To Post On The Department Website A Comprehensive Description Of The Actuarial Model Used By The Department For Homeowners Properties Risk And Other Related Data; To Provide Penalties For Insurance Company Noncompliance; And For Related Purposes.
